summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary of GUY LOUTHAN conducted on January 14, 2021. LOUTHAN describes his distant school acquaintance with Ghislaine Maxwell, a 2016 phone call from Maxwell inquiring about a mutual acquaintance's potential involvement with Jeffrey Epstein, and his relationship with a woman who was clearly affected by her past association with Maxwell and Epstein.

persons.name: Guy Louthan
persons.context: A producer interviewed by the FBI. He knew Ghislaine Maxwell from school and received a concerning phone call from her in 2016 about a mutual acquaintance's potential involvement with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Former schoolmate of Louthan who called him in 2016 to ask about a mutual acquaintance's potential involvement with Jeffrey Epstein or an investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case. Louthan believed Epstein might have been 'in trouble again' when Maxwell called, and a mutual acquaintance showed severe discomfort when his name was mentioned.

persons.name: Jay Musoff
persons.context: Attorney present for Guy Louthan during his FBI interview.

persons.name: Brandon Zamudio
persons.context: Attorney present for Guy Louthan during his FBI interview.

connections.description: Distant school acquaintances from Millfield school in the 1970s. Reconnected socially in the early 2000s and Maxwell called Louthan unexpectedly in 2016.
Maxwell called Louthan to inquire if a mutual acquaintance was 'involved with Epstein', indicating her close association with him.
Musoff was present as Louthan's attorney during his FBI interview.
Zamudio was present as Louthan's attorney during his FBI interview.

events.title: Maxwell's Phone Call to Louthan
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell called Guy Louthan to ask if a mutual acquaintance (his former girlfriend) was involved with Jeffrey Epstein or an investigation. Louthan found the call shocking and unusual.

events.title: FBI Interview of Guy Louthan
events.description: Guy Louthan was interviewed by federal prosecutors and an FBI Special Agent via video conference regarding his knowledge of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Louthan and Maxwell Attend Millfield School
events.description: Guy Louthan and Ghislaine Maxwell attended the same boarding school (Millfield) in Somerset, England. Louthan knew of her due to her prominent status.

events.title: Possible Brief Introduction to Epstein
events.description: Maxwell may have briefly introduced Louthan to Jeffrey Epstein at an event in London.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell proactively called an old school acquaintance, Guy Louthan, in 2016 to inquire if a mutual friend was 'involved with Epstein' or an investigation, suggesting she was monitoring potential witnesses or victims.

A woman acquainted with both Louthan and Maxwell (referred to but not named in the document) exhibited extreme distress (turning white, stammering) when the names of Maxwell or Epstein were mentioned, indicating traumatic association.
Louthan believed the reason for Maxwell's unusual 2016 call was that 'Epstein was in trouble again', showing awareness of Epstein's recurring legal issues.
The interview reveals Maxwell's pattern of reaching out to peripheral social contacts, possibly to gather information or influence potential witnesses years after Epstein's initial legal troubles.
